w:r.w:t: .00 per week per lesson; Extended Class fee is $7.00 for a 60 minute lesson. Advanced class fee is $10.00 per week/per 90 minute class
. Prepayment for semester entitles you to one free lesson. Uniforms are available
New student registrations will be accepted through the 3
week of class, why not refer a friend?
For more information, check our website at
or call our office Mon-Fri at 480-603-3780, between 9:30 a.m.-4:30 p.m.
All star class fee is $7.00 for a 60 minute lesson
Prepayment for semester entitles you to one free lesson
Metallic Silver and red pom-pons will be available
for $12.00 (tax included) or you may bring your own

or you may bring your own.
